casebody.data:
Thomas MARRA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 29, 2017 Cheryl L. Juniewic, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Emily D. Trudeau, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Thomas Marra's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 908 , 154 A.3d 1123 (2017), is denied.

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
